article.aside: How to make tag indexes and clouds.
article.p: Tags are useful for organising your content. As of version 0.1.1, you can specify tags for each article as follows:
The data-sblg-tags attribute indicates the tags of an article. You can have as many space-separated tags as you'd like.
Once you've added the tags, you can use them when generating <nav> entries in the blog amalgation. This is used in the index.html page of this site.
The above navigation element will only display entries with the foo tag.
